features: >> >>Loop-End Design : 18oz mop head with looped-end , yarn tailband prevent the loops from getting tangle and reduce fraying. And it also helps the loops flat on the floor for maximum surface area contact

>> >> Heavy Duty Commercial Industrial Dust Mop : We choose very good quality material , highly versatile mop is able to absorb any dirty water quickly and clean all types of mess . it make your daily life cleaning more easily .
>> >>67 inch stainless steel handle : Sturdy handle with 67inch length ,No need to bend for mopping the floor , very suitable for USA market

>> Installation : Thumb wheel can be screwed up or down for helping release the mop head or tightly clamp the mop head down into the position . A side gate for easily remove and replace mop head, Simply open the latch, slip the mop head into the position ,then clip the gate tightly

>> >>Multi-purpose use : Our versatile wet floor mop is perfect for commercial and home floor cleaning jobs . It can be used to clean tile floor, marble floor, concrete floor, and wood floor. Product warranty period of 60 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: We were quite pleased with these mops! Exactly what we needed - good quality, good price, arrived quickly! Merchant was also very responsive & helpful when we contacted them for assistance! Would def purchase again if we find we need more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for the price - will last a while
reviews.reviewText: Only thing I found difficult was to get the poles together. But once you've got that done, no problems! Very decent quality and thickness for the price you are paying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice mop handles strong ss light weight ,picks up dirt like a magnetCleans fast better than cotton mops

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very long handles
reviews.reviewText: Beware that the handles attached to the mop heads are very long. This was a misread on my part. Quality of mop okay

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly Recommend - Just as good as the name brands
reviews.reviewText: We are extremely pleased with the quality, especially in consideration of the very fair price. The mop heads are considerably thick and stay in position very well while rigorously mopping. They are very absorbent. Since we have only used these a handful of times, we cannot speak to the durability yet. However, given their premium feel and tidy results, we are confident that these will last just as long as the name brands. Buy these with confidence. Highly recommend - Thank you! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its two mops
reviews.reviewText: Can confirm, both mops can mop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice mops 2 in a box
reviews.reviewText: The mops come washable and the hand is made if metal that screw on nicely the only thing is when mopping handle comes unscrewed they should have some kind of locking hinge other than that great product and u get 2 of them in the box. Long lasting and also washable
